ComicInfo.Summary:
What more do you need to know? It’s Zombie Tramp, Vampblade, and Dollface in cosmic combat!!! Everyone’s favorite bad girls must continue their conquest in the arena with the hopes of working out their way home.
Features artist and action figure variant covers (each with their own risqué variant as well)!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Celor (a) & Jukka Issakainen (c) | 1 | | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Celor | 2 | | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | R.B. White (a) & Arnaldo Robles (c) | 3 | | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | R.B. White | 4 | | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 6 |
ComicInfo.Title: Part Three
